Explore Ann Arbor

Neighborhoods Landmarks Events

Neighborhoods

  • Downtown

    Discover the vibrant heart of Ann Arbor with shops, restaurants, and cultural sites.

  • South University

    A trendy district filled with cafés, bookshops, and the University of Michigan campus.

  • Old West Side

    Step back in time with historic homes and quiet streets in this charming neighborhood.

Landmarks

  • University of Michigan

    One of the most prestigious universities in the world, with stunning architecture and green spaces.

  • Nichols Arboretum

    A beautiful outdoor park with trails, gardens, and views of the Huron River.

  • Zingerman's Deli

    A famous local deli known for its delicious sandwiches and unique food offerings.

Upcoming Events

  • Ann Arbor Art Fair

    A four-day event showcasing art from local and national artists.

  • Ann Arbor Farmers Market

    A great place to find fresh, local produce and handcrafted goods.

  • University of Michigan Football Games

    Join the excitement at the "Big House" for Michigan's home games!
